name: piSTAR Landia Environment
description: A 2d multi-player playground for AI agents. Humans are also welcome.
installation_instructions:
Requires manual installation.
Please visit http://github.com/pistarlab/landia for details.

name: Petting Zoo
description:
Small subset of environments from Pettingzoo project.
WARNING: For advanced users, may require wrappers which are not yet available in piSTAR Lab's UI
installation_instructions:
Requires piSTAR Landia to be installed manualy.
Please visit http://github.com/pistarlab/landia for details.

name: Stable Baseline 3
description: Agents from Stable baseline agent 3  https://stable-baselines3.readthedocs.io/en/master/. Currently does not support MultiAgent Environments.
original_author: Raffin, Antonin and Hill, Ashley et al. - https://github.com/DLR-RM/stable-baselines3
